text: The room was clean, it corresponds to photos on the site.
It has the good value for money.
Convenient location, cleanliness, perfect price/quality ratio
Mieli≈õmy uczucie , jak by≈õmy byli w domu.
Bed was very comfortable, room temperature good, very pleasant staff.
Good location - a few minutes walk to 2 metro stations.
Don't take it!  Breakfast is organized via an adjacent restaurant.
The hotel told me that I could pay at the hotel [UAH 110] or at the restaurant.
There is a fixed menu, including an omelette.
I opted to pay at the restaurant.
I identified myself as a hotel guest and ordered an omelette.
The bill was UAH 232 because I did not have a token from the hotel.
The hotel called the restaurant manager several times to fix the problem, but even though he told the hotel he would change the bill, he charged me the full amount.
And he was RUDE.  After I returned to the hotel, they called him again, but the hotel Manager refused to do anything.
Tasty breakfast, the room is clean, warm and cozy.
No extraneous sounds  at night which is important.
Well, I didn't have a minibar in the room.
Also no water and no glasses.
And only 10 TV channels - not good ones.

Location close to metro and Palats Ukraine.
THIS HOTEL HAS A BED BUGS!!! It's horrible hotel with an irresponsible administrator.
This hotel is so hard to find, because there are no signs or names.
The photo of the entrance is wrong.
The administrator of this hostel never answers on the phone and later calls you from the different phone numbers.

Don't trust this administrator! I called to her like –∞ week before date and booked the one more room on the phone, but when I came she said the room is busy now and I have for you a room in different hotel which on the different side of the city.
Hotel is clean and close to Railway terminal.
Hotel located far from all interesting places and far from public transport - in industrial area on territory of old factory "Electron".
City Center is arounD 35-40 min by walk Hotel looks like made from old administrative building of the factory.
Old beds, old furniture, no TV in a room.

My girlfriend loves cleanliness, so she was really upset that everything was very old and didn't look right, especially a dirty bed and a shower.
Clean, close to the centre, no offensive odors, good choice for a single traveller or for a couple.
There were a few things that might be improved: kettle needs cleaning and toilet scrubber needs a replacement.
It is better to use professional bed sheets (white) so the guests could see that they are clean.

Actually, there was no free parking near the hotel.
To get to nearest free parking as well as paid one driver should walk for about 300-400 meters.
Great mini-hotel, walking distance to historical center of Lviv, friendly staff, cosy and clean room.
The only thing I would suggest to improve is to get softer paper tissues for hotel rooms.
The ones we had in our room were to harsh for my nose (I caught a cold and had to use them a lot).
Super comfortable bed, the grateful bathroom, very pleasant stuff, and greatest a place of hotel.

- center but very calm - breakfast, Galician cheese dumplings - best ever! great coffee (ok, it's not always good coffee at breakfast in hotels) - tasty food (i had dinner twice in hotel) - awesome personal - good bed - everyday cleaning
- it was a little cold in the room but they give the space heater (I'm warm lover so maybe it's just my trouble)

Special thanks to Ilana the receptionist for the treatment and service.

EN: It was no chance to sleep because of mosquitoes, in the morning the whole wall was covered by bloody corpses.
Cool owner, very clean everywhere, great view, new building
Conexiunea la internet este foarte bunƒÉ.
The internet connection is very good.
Hotelul de fapt nu prea e hotel.
Cele 5 camere sunt amplasate la mansarda unor cluburi de noapte.
Nop»õile sunt groaznice, muzica de club este foarte puternicƒÉ, nivelul decibelilor se reduce doar dupƒÉ ora 3 a.m. »ôi √ÆnceteazƒÉ total pe la 5-6 a.m.
Nu existƒÉ personal la recep»õie, nu se vorbe»ôte deloc engleza, fiind foarte greu sƒÉ te √Æn»õelegi cu cei de acolo.
Se plƒÉte»ôte doar cash √Æn moneda localƒÉ »ôi nu se elibereazƒÉ facturƒÉ sau chitan»õƒÉ.
The hotel is not really a hotel.
The 5 rooms are located in the attic of some night clubs.
The nights are terrible, the club music is very strong, the decibel level drops only after 3 a.m. and completely ceases at 5-6 a.m.
There is no staff at the reception, no English is spoken at all, it is very difficult to get acquainted with the people there.
Only cash is paid in local currency and no invoice or receipt is issued.
Cute small hotel where you feel in harmony.
Marvelous sea view from the room.
Tasty breakfasts, although it might be not convenient to sit in small crowded room waiting for your meal.

It's turned out that for dinners we payed 750 UAH per day for 2 persons, but we could order only for 600 UAH for dinner, so it's reasonably to take B&B option and eat like an ordinary client in the restaurant.
Location is great, rooms and bathrooms are clean, hotel was quiet when we were there.
Check in - there was a group check in before us (20+ people) and 2 staff members couldn't deal with them for 30 minutes, it was just chaos.
Desk lady Irina was particularly unfriendly.
When booking via booking.com the rooms are more expensive and breakfast is not included. but according to the hotel price list my room was cheaper and including breakfast.
I'll make a complaint to booking.com.
Rooms have balcony, it's so ruined that it seems it will fall down, and the worse- there was no secure lock for the kids at all.
Ask for a room without balcony.
Everything was classy -- the interior looks like everything was there for a few ages but still looks gorgeous.
The stuff is very friendly and helped us to resolve several questions like we haven't even have it.
Highly recommend this hotel to everyone.
There was absolutely nothing that was wrong
Quiet hotel with some nostalgic details.
There are all you need for a comfortable stay.
A quite good bathroom and lavatory equipment, nice staff.
There should be an	electric kettle in the room as well as a hairdryer.
Walls are sound transparent—éSo you should be cautiously speaking at your mobile phone :)
Great location in the city centre though in a quiet place.
The room is spacious and comfortable.
It's clean in the room and in the hotel in general - which is crucial for me.
They provide a variety of food options for breakfast - everything looks good, and what I tried was tasty.
Meat products are not served for breakfast, but for me it's not a big deal.
The staff is very friendly and helpful.

Another benefit of the hotel is that it is actually part of Menorah Centre where you can book an excursion to the observation deck on the rooftop and enjoy the marvellous city view (the current cost is 50 UAH).

There were only few things however they actually didn't affect my impression much: - there's a small piece chipped on the surface beside the sink in the bathroom; - they provided me with a street view room as I asked (and I appreciate that), but the roof of the neighbouring building takes up the part of the view from the window; - there's no shelf in the shower stall to place the toiletries, only a soap holder which wasn't fixed properly.
Good location, good personal, good breakfast, comfortable bed
Small window in the room (Standard on 7th floor) with a bad view.
Horoshuj snidanok, svitla prostora kimnata, miake lizhko, roztashyvannia syper i vud z vikna prujemnuj
Good location (city center/bars/restaurants in walking distance), nice and friendly staff, good WiFi.
Noise at night, we woke up twice because of a loud noise.
Size of bed (it's narrow). 2 wedding parties was held there during our visit, so we can't have a dinner at the restaurant.
V restoran z hotelju treba jity cherez vylytsju
